articles.description: A book tracking Richmond's path to the 2020 premiership reveals that the club's leaders were concerned at the impact Damien Hardwick's attitude to COVID-19 restrictions were having on the team's performance.
articles.content:
"He just had to be more positive."
At that stage Hardwick had ripped COVID-safe posters off the walls inside the club and was questioning AFL decisions made to safeguard the competition which saw pl… [+2454 chars]

articles.title: A-League: Case for a second Brisbane team stronger after Roar’s move to Redcliffe - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: A-League: Case for a second Brisbane team stronger after Roar’s move to Redcliffe
articles.content: The Roars defection to Redcliffe has left the door wide open for a second Queensland A-League team to be based in Brisbane.With the Roar now only Brisbane in name following the club’s abandonment of … [+2748 chars]

articles.author: Brad Walter
articles.title: Warriors aim to sell out homecoming after being forced to relocate - NRL.COM
articles.description: The Warriors will relocate to Australia for the start of the 2021 season, with the club's opening two home games against Gold Coast and Newcastle to be played at Central Coast Stadium.
articles.content: The Warriors are aiming to return to New Zealand for a sold-out homecoming match against Manly on April 9 as one of the Telstra Premierships frontrunners after being forced to relocate to Australia f… [+4895 chars]
